column5: Military couple looking to rent out private bedroom and shared bathroom. Room includes memory foam topper on regular full size bed, dresser, closet and desk. Brand new house in quiet neighborhood of San Antonio, just 9 miles from SAMMC. Close to Forum shopping center, Costco and Randolph AFB. Please, no smoking or unauthorized guests. Owners live on site with well behaved dog. Room comes with Wifi and TV. Shared kitchen and other living spaces included with laundry.
